author-notes.corresp: Address correspondence to Wendy S. Barclay, w.barclay@imperial.ac.uk.

fn.p: Citation Staller E, Sheppard CM, Neasham PJ, Mistry B, Peacock TP, Goldhill DH, Long JS, Barclay WS. 2019. ANP32 proteins are essential for influenza virus replication in human cells. J Virol 93:e00217-19. https://doi.org/10.1128/JVI.00217-19.
